task.title: Add test cases to a test suite
task.shortdesc: There are several ways to add test cases into test suites in . You can drag and drop test case into test suites or use the test suite editor to manually add the test case. You can add a test case in the same test suite many times.

context.p: To add test cases to a test suite, do as follows:

step.cmd: Open a test suite, then select Add Test Case from the command toolbar.

image.alt: Add test cases to a test suite

result.p: All test cases in are displayed in the Test Case Browser dialog for you to select your preferred options. The selected test cases are added to the test case list accordingly.
By default, the checkbox at the end of the test case row is checked. It means that the test case is executed when you run a test suite. If you want to disable a test case execution, uncheck the box.
